contents:
Shi Zhengli 這個名字確實在澳大利亞的新聞上頻繁出現，還得了一個諢名——Chinese Batswoman.


"Coronavirus: Wuhan Institute of Virology’s Shi Zhengli insists COVID-19 did not escape from her ‘world-class lab’"
https://www.news.com.au/technology/science/coronavirus-wuhan-institute-of-virologys-shi-zhengli-insists-covid19-did-not-escape-from-her-worldclass-lab/news-story/3eabff7a9485a4cae018628adc76473c

"Coronavirus: Chinese ‘batswoman’ scientist Shi Zhengli’s chilling prediction"
https://www.news.com.au/world/asia/coronavirus-chinese-batswoman-scientist-shi-zhenglis-chilling-prediction/news-story/99542343419bb8f210a4f196df1654fb
